/** *!/usr/bin/env node * -*- coding: utf-8 -*- * Adewale Joshua Portfolio (AJP) App */ /** * author: OTechCup * copyright: Copyright 2022 - new Date().getFullYear(), Exfac Inc. * credits: ["Mr. O"] * version: process.env.AJP_VERSION * maintainer: OTechCup * email: support@exfac.info * status: process.env.AJP_ENVIRONMENT_STATUS */ // import modules import React from "react"; import "../static/assets/css/Resume.css"; function Resume() { return (

Resume

Check My Resume

Summary

Adewale Joshua

"I get excited about anything that involves solving problems, whether it's figuring out how to optimize a certain part of an existing application or entirely coming up with new applications to solve certain needs, because problems in general stimulate my brain and give me a great sense of satisfaction."

My primary focus and inspiration for my studies is Artificial Intelligence Development. In my free time, I study human computer interface and the psychology of human computer interaction. I'm both driven and self-motivated and I'm constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques. I'm very passionate about Artificial Intelligence Development and strive to better myself in all my specialties and their community as a whole.

  • Kaduna, Nigeria.
  • (+234) 705-300-1118
  • adewalejoshua13@gmail.com

Education

B.Sc Computer Science

2017 - 2020

National Open University of Nigeria

Participated in hackathon with my coursemates and many more.

Reference

Available on request.

Professional Experience

Full Stack Developer

2022 - Present

Phoenix Information Technology

  • Create in-house mobile, web, and desktop applications.
  • Maintaining, updating, debugging and improve existing clients software.
  • Work closely with other team members of the development team and provide counsel on all aspects of the project.
  • Perform code reviews.
  • Coaching junior developers.

Software Engineer

2021 - Present

Exfac Inc.

  • Researching/investigating on new technologies, designing and creating computer software/frameworks to solve real-world problems and executes the build.
  • Maintaining, testing, evaluating, upgrading, optimizing new/old software for speed, scalability and identifying areas for modification, improving software built by other engineers to meet particular needs, analyzing users' needs/requirements and developing programs to satisfy those needs, integrating existing software products, get incompatible platforms to work together, monitoring and correcting software defects.
  • Writing and Performing code reviews/audit, refining and rewriting it as necessary and communicate with any programmers involved in the project.
  • Consulting clients, engineers, security specialists, colleagues and other stakeholders concerning the maintenance and performance of software systems, with a view to writing or modifying current software systems.
  • Coaching junior developers.
  • Presenting new features to stakeholders and internal customers.
  • Create systems to control the scheduling of jobs or to control the access allowed to users or remote systems and write operational documentation with technical authors.
  • Working closely with other staff, such as project managers, graphic designers, UX designers, other developers, systems analysts, sales and marketing professionals.
  • Applying engineering principles and knowledge of programming languages to build software solutions for end users.

IT Professional

2018 - Present

Chartered Institute of Information and Strategy Management

  • Developed numerous marketing programs (logos, brochures, infographics, presentations, and advertisements) etc.
  • Managed up to 5 or even more projects or tasks at a given time while under pressure.
  • Maintaining computer networks and systems.
  • Building, testing, installing and repairing hardware and software.
  • Supervise the assessment of all graphic materials in order to ensure quality and accuracy of the design.

Graphic Design Specialist

2019 - 2021

Myraid Instinct Graphics

  • Help clients communicate an appealing image through digital, electronic, and print media.
  • Use digital illustration, photo editing software and layout software to create designs.
  • Meet with clients or the art director to determine the scope of any project.
  • Create visual elements such as logos, original images and illustrations to help deliver a message.
  • Incorporates graphics into advertising and marketing campaigns, films, packaging and other promotional materials.

IT Professional

2017 - Present

Globacom Limited

  • Testing, installing and repairing hardware and software.
  • Maintaining computer systems.
  • And many more.

); }; export default Resume;
